full_summary:
**Tender Notice**
================ Autorisation de-demande de propositions

**Hitleritle franais Title**: Upgrade and Integration of Existing Building Automation System (BAS) to the Desigo CC Platform that Controls Two Remote Sites

**Identification géométrique**
---------------------------

* **Présenté par:** National Research Council Canada
* **Fournisseur:** Siemens (systèmes exclusifs)

**Explications**
---------------

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites eligible suppliers to submit a proposal for the continued service and maintenance of an existing computer-based Building Automation System (BAS) at its Halifax and Ketch Harbour sites. The system consists of the Desigo CC platform, which integrates and controls HVAC/R systems for mechanical and electrical infrastructure points.

**Objectif**
----------

* **Description**: The contract award is for the upgraded and integrated system that provides direct digital control (DDC) of more than 1,000 points to ensure efficient monitoring and control of mechanical and electrical systems.
*   **Description administration**: This upgrade project includes the redesign of programming graphics, complete graphical interface, real time visual graphical implementation, technical support and optimization of the system. It is a trade-specific contract with an initial duration of one year.

**Resultat**
----------

**Expecté**
--------

*   **Douée:** May 2023.
